author: Angelos Bafas
description: Cognac shines with a delicate fruitiness in this dryish, bittersweet stirred cocktail served on the rocks.
name: The Southern Alliance
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a large chunk of block ice)
